meanings.definition: Below the usual or required level of potency.
meanings.sent1: The subpotent medicine did not work as well as expected.
meanings.sent3: The subpotent glue couldn't even hold a piece of paper together.
meanings.sent4: Her subpotent singing voice failed to impress the audience.
meanings.sent5: The subpotent coffee lacked the usual kick to start the day.

meanings.definition: Having less than the necessary strength or effectiveness.
meanings.sent1: The subpotent solution did not clean the stain completely.
meanings.sent2: The subpotent team struggled to win the game.
meanings.sent3: His subpotent attempt at a joke fell flat.
meanings.sent4: The subpotent light bulb barely illuminated the room.
meanings.sent5: The subpotent umbrella couldn't withstand the strong wind.
